alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:35PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Natrona County through 515 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and thunderstorms moving east at 40 mph across central Natrona County. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea sized hail, and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in the path of this storm include Casper, Casper Mountain, Paradise Valley, Mills, Evansville, Bar Nunn, Emigrant Gap, and Homa Hills. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 206. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
